description: Haruka is a high school girl in the dance club. Her friends praise her for being so tall and attractive, and she works hard to keep up the image every day. One evening on her way home from practice, she reaches her limit and suddenly runs down the streets of Uraharajuku. Eventually, she finds an entrance to a strange shop and opens the old doors to discover that it belongs to the witch Nina. Haruka is attracted to a lipstick, but rejects it, saying that`s it`s not like her, but Nina forcefully applies it on Haruka. "Do you want to peer deeper?" After Nina says this, Haruka is taken to a magical space.
